program-list.name: program-list
program-list.description: Collect a list of all programs from Vinnova that have been changed or altered since a certain date. The programs are identified by a unique ID, called 'Diarienummer'

data.description: The date to start collecting data from. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD, such as 2016-01-01, 2017-02-13.

program-details.name: program-details
program-details.description: Collect detailed information about a specific program from Vinnova given a unique ID

data.description: The unique ID of the program to collect detailed information about. The format of the ID is YYYY-NNNNN, such as 2016-01234, 2017-12345.

utlysning-list.name: utlysning-list
utlysning-list.description: Collect a list of all calls for applications or 'utlysningar' (in Swedish) from Vinnova that have been changed or altered since a certain date. The utlysningar are identified by a unique ID, called 'Diarienummer'.

data.description: The date to start collecting data from. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD, such as 2016-01-01, 2017-02-13.

utlysning-details.name: utlysning-details
utlysning-details.description: Collect detailed information about a specific call for applications or 'utlysning' (in Swedish) from Vinnova given a unique ID

data.description: The unique ID of the call for applications or 'utlysning' to collect detailed information about. The format of the ID is YYYY-NNNNN, such as 2016-01234, 2017-12345.

ansokningsomgang-list.name: ansokningsomgang-list
ansokningsomgang-list.description: Collect a list of all application rounds or 'ansökningsomgångar' (in Swedish) from Vinnova that have been changed or altered since a certain date. The application rounds are identified by a unique ID, called 'Diarienummer'.

data.description: The date to start collecting data from. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD, such as 2016-01-01, 2017-02-13.

ansokningsomgang-details.name: ansokningsomgang-details
ansokningsomgang-details.description: Collect detailed information about a specific application round or 'ansökningsomgång' (in Swedish) from Vinnova given a unique ID

data.description: The unique ID of the application round or 'ansökningsomgång' to collect detailed information about. The format of the ID is YYYY-NNNNN, such as 2016-01234, 2017-12345.

projekt-list.name: projekt-list
projekt-list.description: Collect a list of all projects from Vinnova that have been changed or altered since a certain date. The projects are identified by a unique ID, called 'Diarienummer'.

data.description: The date to start collecting data from. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD, such as 2016-01-01, 2017-02-13.

projekt-details.name: projekt-details
projekt-details.description: Collect detailed information about a specific project from Vinnova given a unique ID

data.description: The unique ID of the project to collect detailed information about. The format of the ID is YYYY-NNNNN, such as 2016-01234, 2017-12345.
